name: Godot vs. Unity
description:
This platformer contains 6 levels. The last one is a boss fight. The game is about 75 minutes long. It was made in about 4 months.

If you're impatient, don't download this game! It's hard and you won't like it!

Story

Do you like Godot game engine? In this platformer, Unity wants to destroy all other engines. You play as Godot and have to stop Unity. (I know that it's a weird idea.)

How to help

If you like the game, please leave a comment with what's good and what I should improve. And if you don't like my game, leave a comment with constructive criticism anyways. :-) Tell about the game to other people. I'll be glad for every download and comment!
